pullRequest.title: [BEAM-10629] KnownBuilderInstances in ExternalTransformRegistrar
pullRequest.bodyText:
Rely on instances of ExternalTransformBuilder rather than on class objects in ExternalTransformBuilder. This is in anticipation of implementing cross language transforms using the SchemaIOProvider interface, which requires a SchemaIO specific to the IO.
R: @TheNeuralBit
R: @robinyqiu

nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -31,4 +34,27 @@
 
   /** A mapping from URN to an {@link ExternalTransformBuilder} class. */

nodes.bodyText: I think after this change there are no callers to buildTransform, can you remove it?
There should be a default implementation for this that just returns an empty Map, that way new implementations will only have to override knownBuilderInstances()
